title: In the Court of the Crimson King (Patreon Clip)

itunes:subtitle: Here's a preview of our all-new Patreon exclusive episode that finds the Losers discussing the origins of the Crimson King and whether or not he's an effective villain. Want more? Head on over to www.patreon.com/thebarrens and become...
description:
Here's a preview of our all-new Patreon exclusive episode that finds the Losers discussing the origins of the Crimson King and whether or not he's an effective villain. Want more? Head on over to www.patreon.com/thebarrens and become a Patron for more exclusive bonus content!


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
